tutorial: How to Set up a New Chart

definition.text: I know I'm ready to customize some charts. Are you? Let's walk through how to add the foundational nodes we need to start our chart.

paragraphs.text: I have already set up the dashboard and time machine you will need, but let's talk through how you could add them yourself in the future.
To add a Dashboard hover over the Project Dashboards node and click Add Dashboard.
To add a Time Machine hover over your Dashboard and click Add Time Machine.
A time machine has three scales (Rate, Time, and Time Frame). These are necessary for a time machine to work correctly.
